sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"喇叭，小号"之意。
means: trumpet ： 泛指一般由黄铜做的喇叭，不拘大小而言。
bugle ： 一般指军队中吹信号用的小喇叭。

sentence.Network_en: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的小号演奏独创一格。

sentence.Network_en: The trumpet can be heard all over their house.
sentence.Network_cn: 喇叭声整栋房子都能听见。

sentence.Network_en: Jones hasn't touched a trumpet in 10 years.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 曲风列表 - 一听音乐网 ... 单簧管/ Clarinet 小号/ Trumpet 手风琴/ Accordion.
人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... piano n. 钢琴 trumpet n. 喇叭 violin n. 小提琴.
第11轨讯号就是小喇叭（Trumpet）的音乐讯号，这一轨里，又分为两个段落，第一段的Trumpet拥有较佳的透明度与活生感便是Ches…
有说是报时的号角（trumpet），报知凌晨三时。这「号角」的字用在马可福音 13:35 和马太福音 26:34。

list.abs: 喇叭花 (Trumpet Flower) 花之语 : 名誉花寓意 : 您有天真无邪的性情，却喜欢模仿大人的精明干练，使您看来非常有趣。您很有异性 …

航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... speaking terminal 传话口 speaking trumpet 喇叭筒 speaking tube 传话筒传声筒.
喇叭口 trumpet喇叭裙 trumpet skirt箱；干管 trunk

jx.jx_en_mean: talk openly and boastfully about one's achievements

lj.lj_ly: he refused to &B{blow his own trumpet} and blushingly declined to speak.
lj.lj_ls: 他拒绝自我吹嘘，羞红着脸不肯发言。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French trompette, diminutive of trompe (see trump). The verb dates from the mid 16th cent

entry.def: A trumpet is a musical instrument of the brass family which plays quite high notes.

entry.tran: 大力鼓吹;积极宣扬;大力宣传
entry.def: If someone trumpets something that they are proud of or that they think is important, they speak about it publicly in a very forceful way.

example.ex: The government has been trumpeting tourism as a growth industry...
example.tran: 政府一直积极宣扬旅游业是快速发展型产业。

example.ex: …Mark Morris, who is trumpeted as the dance talent of his generation…
example.tran: 马克·莫里斯，被吹捧为他那一代的舞蹈奇才

entry.def: When an elephant trumpets, it makes a loud sound.

example.ex: The elephants trumpeted and stamped their feet at their approach.
example.tran: 当他们靠近时，大象又吼又跺脚。

means.word_mean: 1. a brass musical instrument with a brilliant tone; has a narrow tube and a flared bell and is played by means of valves
1. proclaim on, or as if on, a trumpet;

sentences.sentence: "Liberals like to trumpet their opposition to the death penalty"

means.word_mean: 2. play or blow on the trumpet

auth_sentence.content: Figgis plays trumpet, guitar, bass and keyboards.

sentences.en: She played a tune on her trumpet.
sentences.cn: 她用小号吹了一支乐曲。

sentences.en: She is always trumpeting her son.

jushi.english: She played a tune on her trumpet.
jushi.chinese: 她用小号吹了一支乐曲。
